RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Level 1B Limb data contains calibrated radiance data over multiple scans that are geolocated into a GUVI-based coordinate system on the limb.

PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory

AccessURL.Name: GUVI POC L1B Imaging Data Request
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows the request of data files for this product. To request data: select the year and day then press display.

Parameter.Name: Starting Time
Parameter.Description: Starting date/time of file's observation encoded in a 13-digit string and stored as a single netCDF global attribute.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [1] - this parameter is a single element per file.

Parameter.Name: Stopping Time
Parameter.Description: Stopping date/time of file's observation encoded in a 13-digit string and stored as a single netCDF global attribute.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [1] - this parameter is a single element per file.

Parameter.Name: Day of Year
Parameter.Description: Date of observation in number of days since start of current year.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [n] - where n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Time
Parameter.Description: Time of observation in integral number of milliseconds since start of current day. Timestamp marks beginning of interval

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [n] - where n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Detector
Parameter.Description: Detector number of detector being used

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [n] - where n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Slit position
Parameter.Description: Slit position being used where 0 = closed, 1 = wide, 2 = medium, 3 = narrow, and 4 = unknown.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [n] - where n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Mirror start position
Parameter.Description: Starting position of the mirror.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [n] - where n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Mirror nadir position
Parameter.Description: Position of the mirror when at nadir.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [n] - where n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Dark count pixels
Parameter.Description: Four separate dark pixels that measure instumental dark counts. These values are use to scale a dark pixel mask to obtain an estimated dark level that can then subtracted from each pixel.
Parameter.Caveats: This correction is generally not applied because the GUVI dark pixels seem to see varying amounts of scattered light at a level substantially larger than the miniscule "true" dark level.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [4,n] - where 4 is the number of dark count pixels, or NumDarkCountPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Background count pixels
Parameter.Description: GUVI long backgrounds measured on a 3x7 grid (3 spatial pixel intervals, 7 scan/mirror step intervals), and integrated for time intervals of [1.088, 1.674,1.674, 1.674, 1.674, 1.674, 1.488] seconds, finishing at scan/mirror steps [ 31, 26, 53, 80, 107, 134, 158]. The first 32 steps are on the limb (1.088 = 32x0.034 seconds/ limb step), whereas the next six intervals are distributed across the 32 disk scan steps.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [21,n] - where 21 is the number of background count pixels, or NumBackgroundCountPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Indicator
Parameter.Description: Data quality indicator stored as bit-encoded integers where Bit 7: 1 = Negative Radiance, 0 = positive; Bit 6: 1 = Zero Radiance, 0 = non-zero; Bit 5: 1 = Geolocation error (disk pixel on limb or limb pixel on disk), 0 = correct geolocation; Bit 4: 1 = Calibration failure, 0 = No calibration failure; Bits 0-3 are unused.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [5,14,32,n] - where 5 is the number of colors, or NumColors; 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Background Star At Pixel Indicator
Parameter.Description: Background Star At Pixel Indicator stored as integers: 1 = true; 0 = false.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [14,32,n] - where 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Tangent Point Latitude
Parameter.Description: Tangent Point Latitude

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [14,32,n] - where 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Tangent Point Longitude
Parameter.Description: Tangent Point Longitude

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [14,32,n] - where 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Tangent Point Altitude
Parameter.Description: Tangent Point Altitude

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [14,32,n] - where 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Zenith Angle
Parameter.Description: Zenith Angle

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [14,32,n] - where 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Right Ascension
Parameter.Description: Right Ascension

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [14,32,n] - where 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Declination
Parameter.Description: Declination

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [14,32,n] - where 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Calibration Error
Parameter.Description: Calibration error

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [5,14,32,n] - where 5 is the number of colors, or NumColors; 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Counting Statistical Error
Parameter.Description: Count error
Parameter.Caveats: If Bit 6 of Data Quality Indicator (DQI) parameter is set, then set the value returned is in units of Rayleighs/count (unscaled)

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [5,14,32,n] - where 5 is the number of colors, or NumColors; 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Solar Zenith Angle
Parameter.Description: Solar Zenith Angle

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [14,32,n] - where 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.

Parameter.Name: Imaging Mode Limb Radiance Data
Parameter.Description: Radiance scans of nominally 14 pixels along track and 32 pixels crosstrack for each of 5 colors (1216, 1304, 1356 A, LBH1 and LBH2).

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [5,14,32,n] - where 5 is the number of colors, or NumColors; 14 is the number of along track pixels, or NumAlongTrackPixels; 32 is the number of across track pixels, or NumAcrossTrackPixels; n is the number of scans, or NumScans, (i.e., records) in an orbital file.
